name: Servant Bathroom
longDes: You are standing in a tiny, spartan bathroom. There isn’t much here besides a toilet, sink, and faded mirror. There is a smell in the air here, not of the bathroom but something else that you can’t quite place. There is a small shelf below the bathroom mirror that holds a few of the servant’s things. To the West is the door back to the servant’s quarters.
shortDes: You find yourself in the servant’s bathroom. There is not much here of note besides a small shelf below the mirror. A door to the West leads back to the servant’s quarters.

features.name: ledge
features.preActionDes: You see something on the ledge.
features.inActionDes: Upon further inspection, you notice that there's a lock of hair tied with a red ribbon.
features.postActionDes: You took the lock of hair from this ledge.
